name: Henry Green
description: As I write this at 03:40 am, I think to myself 'why in the bloody hell did I take this on?!'. Nirmeet, Chelsea, John, Chadrick, Laura, Lee, Sade and all the other team, I think I speak for everyone when I say a huge THANK YOU for being so kind, considerate and helpful. You've taken a technological idiot and turned into a slightly less technological idiot, and for that I will be eternally grateful! Wishing you all the best of luck in whatever you do.

name: Elizaveta (Lisa) Anufrieva
description: Thank you so much to Chelsea and Nirmeet for an incredible bootcamp experience. I am so grateful to have gotten Chelsea as my TA. Your joyful attitude was such a pleasure to experience and I am so thankful for you! And Nirmeet!! Your teaching skills are by far the best I've ever experienced. You are so talented and I cannot wait to stalk your LinkedIn and see what you accomplish. You're both absolutely amazing

name: WendyVsQz
description: I may not be present in our class enough and sure most of you guys don't even know my existence at all, but I'm fully aware of each of you guys and I am really grateful for this bootcamp program to teach me not only coding but aldo to grow as a person and learn to face my fears the best way possible. Mindset is the key for success.

name: chaitanya varma
description: You have built an army that goes everyday to the war with bugs! Bootcamp skills from you guys are the weapons for us! Couldn't be more thankful for each and every one of you! And one day we will be free from all of this! <Love >

name: Fiona Dunnington
description: Can't believe how much you have taught such a disparate group of people in just 16weeks. Your patience, support, and kindness has been incredible. Thank you!

name: Sam Albert-Fowora
Zainab Sebbar
description: Thank you to Nirmeet and all the TAs for their patience and support throughout the bootcamp. It was a great experience!

name: Gabriel Falade
description: Thank you for the wisdom, for the patience, and for the skills. If you can teach a bunch of newbies like us how to build nice-looking websites, you can do anything!

name: Nicola Cahill
description: Thanks to you all for your expertise, humour & patience !

name: Pei
description: Thank you all so much for dragging me from the dinosaur era of making HTML pages on Dreamweaver (or the dreaded Windows NotePad) with so much knowledge, encouragement, humour and endless amount of patience. I am truly deeply grateful!

name: Laurence Moreton burt
description: Thank you all for a great experience, really feel like I've learnt so much more than I could have hoped for in the space of 3 months!

name: Olena Pelagenko
description: Thank you Nirmeet and TAs for your patience, support and encouragement.  I learnt a lot and feel more confident with coding now! Thank you and good luck!

name: Deric
description: Thank you everyone, I love you all! üíó

name: Pik Yiu LIN
description: Thank you Nirmeet, Sade and all TAs for sharing your knowledge and experience with us!üòçüòò

name: Marta Milewczyk
description: Huge thank you for wonderful Instructor Nirmeet and great TA team. The knowledge and experience you shared with us during the course is invaluable. Thank you for your kindness, humour, patience and high level of professionalismüôåüòç

name: Yuen Lok Si (Laura)
description:
Thank you to Nirmeet and all the TAs! 
Can't believe I can build a website after these 4months! Thanks for the amazing lessons!

name: Axel Jamal
description: Massive thanks and gratitude for the amazing Instructor Nirmeet and TAs especially Austin Slater (TA) ! Love you all üíó

name: Alexandra
description: Thank you all the instructional staff (all: Nirmeet, substitute Laura and also Paul, even though he wasn't with us for long) and TAs for the great 3 months ü´Ç From 0 in JavaScript, I can say at this point I can write some array sorting function ü§å üòÖ But on a serious note, thank you for all the support and Nirmeet's teaching skills to explain algorithms in a simple way. üôå Time flew, and it feels a bit weird now, that there will be no 2pm zoom sessions anymore üòî

name: Ade
description: Thank you Nirmeet, Chadrick, Sade and all the TA's for making this  experience a great one! The teachings and support was great. You took the time to listen and help. So thank you! üôÇ

name: Nathalie Storey
description: This has been an incredibly frustrating and intense 16 weeks, but the joy of finally getting something to work is a high that I don't want to stop. Thank you for giving me the confidence, encouragement and knowledge to keep going, and get to that happy place, where the code works and I feel like a god amongst men. Until I break it again . . . . the cycle continues.

name: Zuzana Knightova
description: Thank you all and especially Nirmeet. I don't know how you managed it but you helped me to complete the Bootcamp! Not something I believed I would achieve, back in January. It was rentless at times but you always assured us and explained whatever we asked about. Teaching is truly one of your strenghts. I am grateful that you were my tutor and I wish you all the best in the future.

name: Lorenzo Francis-Walker
description: Thank you everyone for making this such a pleasant experience. My confidence and skills have grown thanks to you

name: Jenny Hull
description: Thank you Nirmeet, Chelsea and the rest of the team!  Thanks to your patience, guidance and encouragement I've learned more and worked harder on this course than I thought was possible for me, and I am so excited to keep learning! The last 4 months have absolutely flown by. I will miss working with you, and wish you all the best for whatever wonderful things you do next. Thank you!üíó

name: Andrea Gates
description: Thank you Nirmeet (and Paul), also Chadrick and John. You were all so friendly and supportive throughout. I'm very grateful to have been able to take the course, and not a little relieved that it's over... But mostly I'm grateful. Thank you from the bottom of my brain.

name: Amiker
description: Big thank you to Nirmeet, Chadrick, Sade and all the TAs for getting us through the last 16 weeks! Couldn't have done it without your constant support and genuine care and willingness to help. I have learnt so much during this bootcamp and cant wait to see where my career takes me! Thanks again üíó

name: Keith Howell
description: Thank you Nirmeet for your tutoring style as it helped tremendously, to make the course content engaging, and for breaking down concepts, to keep us all motivated. (Not forgetting Paul). A special shout-out to Chadrick, Austin and all the other TA's who made this journey possible throughout the past 16 weeks, those constant support and giving of there time and willingness to assist, has placed me on a path for further growth‚Ä¶ Many blessings to you all !!

name: Aleeza
description: Thanks to all the tas for doing such a great job over these past few months :face_holding_back_tears:. Special s/o to austin for going above and beyond. I hope you all become tech millionaires and are immensely happy in your lives ü§û üòä üíì

name: David Salvat
description: I've had a great time over the last few months and learnt a lot more than I thought possible. Thanks to everyone for all the amazing content and encouragement. I hope we all stay in touch in the future!

name: Mateus Oliveira
description: Thank you Nirmeet and all the TA's, especially John who was the TA of my pod5, it's been 16 weeks of a lot of learning and I have no words to describe how grateful and happy I am.  I just wanna say thanks!!

name: Alice West
description: Nirmeet! Absolutely hats off to you for taking a remote group of 60+ students on what will become a pivotal moment in all our lives. Thank you for your graceful and humorous teaching style. Because of you, I will always think of ‚Äòplaying catch‚Äô by myself when I return a function without a variable. Or my partner coming into the work place and calling me by pet name, when I try to call a variable outside of its scope. Your metaphors were so imaginative and kept me engaged, I just wish I wrote them all down now. I can't thank you enough for guiding us through this journey. ‚òÄÔ∏è Chad! Your kindness, time and dedication know no bounds. Thank you so much for taking the time to understand the problems I was having, even when I wasn't clear on them myself. Your patience and commitment as a mentor is priceless and I feel extremely lucky to have been in your team. Thank you for everything üôè

name: Joe Wray
description: Thank you for giving us the best start we could get and putting up with the repetitive questions! eventually we will understand! big thank you to Chelsea  for being a great TA! and putting up with pod 4

name: Daniele Herteg
description: Thank you Nirmeet for being such a great and engaging instructor! All the tas for being so helpful, especially Lee and Chadwick for answering all my dumb questions. It‚Äôs been an amazing experience and I‚Äôve learnt more than I thought I would be able to haha üíóüíó

name: Maria
description: Nirmeet and all TAs thanks for teaching us! I can‚Äôt believe that in such a short time I learned the whole program of bootcamp üíó

name: Jack Turner
description: Massive thankyou to Nirmeet, Chelsea S., Lee Morgan, Chadrick Hinds, the rest of the TAs and everyone else who I got a chance to work with over the last 4 months. this has been brilliant for me. Really enjoyable and at times, really really challenging but I've learned a hell of a lot, not just about coding, but how to apply myself and execute on my ideas. Massive thankyou to everyone!

name: Natalia Sergovantseva
description: Thanks, Nirmeet, for creating such a friendly and supporting learning atmosphere and for your ongoing support that you went above and beyond, I appreciate it a lot. Thanks Lee Morgan (TA), you helped me and supported so much especially at the very beginning especially, when I was struggling with study,  ready to step off. Thanks Chelsea, John Hysong and Austin Slater, always ready to give a hand and support. All the experience overall was very human, hopefully I will use the hard skills I learnt but soft skills I learnt are even more important.

name: Murtaza
description: Nirmeet I wanted to express my sincerest gratitude for all the hard work and dedication you have put into guiding us through this bootcamp. Your constant support, patience, and willingness to help has been truly inspiring and has helped me learn so much in the past 16 weeks. I feel incredibly fortunate to have had such a wonderful team of instructors and TAs who genuinely care about our success and well-being. I have gained invaluable skills and knowledge that I know will serve me well in my future career, and I owe it all to your expertise and guidance.

name: Iwona Malkinska
description: Thank you Nirmeet for being such an amazing and great instructor!  Also thank you to all the TAs for being so helpful!! It's been a unique experience and I've learnt so much, I will forever be grateful.ü§ç

name: Kelly Serika
description: Thank you to everyone who made this a wonderful experience for me. Nirmeet has been a great help throughout the course. I came here with a little knowledge in front-end development and I feel like I have been given a boost forward to using it in future. Thanks to all the TA's and teammates I have met during this course. Thank You.

name: Lee Dillon
description: Thanks to Nirmeet and all the TA's. I have thoroughly enjoyed every moment of this course and will really miss everyone!

name: NJ
description: Thanks to Nirmeet and all the TAs for their effort to make us move forward in development.
